## Hometown
Nanchang, Jiangxi, China

## Journey to data science
Graduated from University of Southern California, she majored in economics and was eager to explore her career path with data. Data science became an apparent choice.

## Favorite food
Fried chicken and Thai food. Often has them once a week.

## Hobbies
TV series

## Favorite books/movies/artists
Her favorite book genre is fiction, such as Harry Potter.
Her favorite movie is Toy Story, and she loves to watch sit-com.
Taylor Swift is her favorite artist.
